c74object.name: bfa.table_preprocessing~
c74object.digest: Read from a buffer~ and display
c74object.description: Read from a buffer~ and display.

method.name: set_mode
method.description: Set frame selection mode. 0: Period, 1: Custom.

method.name: set
method.digest: Choose a named buffer~ from which to read
method.description: Choose a named buffer~ from which to read.

attribute.name: Target Buffer
attribute.digest: Name of buffer~ to write to
attribute.description: Name of buffer~ to write to

attribute.name: Channel
attribute.digest: Channel to read from the buffer~
attribute.description: Channel to read from the buffer~. The channel number uses 1-based counting.

attribute.name: Input Buffer
attribute.digest: Name of buffer~ to read from
attribute.description: Name of buffer~ to read from.
